Title: Ungirthin' the Earthen
Description:
While I do enjoy beating the black blood out of nerubians, we must save the earthen prisoners first.

I saw they're being held by Arathi ball and chain. Someone like you should be able to shatter them pretty quick. Just... do that thing you do!

Oh, and we should split up to cover more ground. Yeah Leif's gonna complain, but he's always complaining anyway.
